get_all_business:
query($phoneNumber: String!){ 
  getAllBusiness(phoneNumber: $phoneNumber) {
    businessId
      businessName
      businessLogo
      businessPhoneNumber
      businessType
      industryType
      bankDetails {
        accountNumber
        accountHolderName
        ifscCode
        bankBranchName
      }
      upiId
      billingAddress
      gstin
      placeOfSupply
      termsAndConditions
      Signature
      money {
        toPay
        toCollect
        cash
        bank
        stockValue
      }
  }
}
get_business:
query($phoneNumber: String!, $businessId: String!){ 
  getBusiness(phoneNumber: $phoneNumber,businessId: $businessId) {
    businessId
      businessName
      businessLogo
      businessPhoneNumber
      businessType
      industryType
      bankDetails {
        accountNumber
        accountHolderName
        ifscCode
        bankBranchName
      }
      upiId
      billingAddress
      gstin
      placeOfSupply
      termsAndConditions
      Signature
      money {
        toPay
        toCollect
        cash
        bank
        stockValue
      }
  }
}
get_all_transaction:
query($phoneNumber: String!){
  getTransactions(phoneNumber: $phoneNumber) {
      id
      no
      date
      dueDate
      party{
          id
          name
          type
          phoneNumber
          gstin
          billingAddress
          shippingAddress
          creditPeriod
          creditLimit
          balance
          isPay
      }
      item {
        id
        name
        type
        image
        category
        remark
        pricing {
          salesPrice
          purchasePrice
          wholeSalePrice
          wholeSaleQuantity
          mrp
          unit
          hsn
          gst
          isPriceWithTax
        }
        stock {
          stockValue
          asOfDate
          lowStockQuantity
          itemCode
          isLowStockWarning
        }
      }
      discountPercent
      discountAmount
      roundOff
      isRoundOffMinus
      subTotal
      total
      amountReceived
      notes
      type
      paymentMode
  }
}
get_transaction:
query($phoneNumber: String!, $transactionId: String!){
  getTransaction(phoneNumber: $phoneNumber, transactionId: $transactionId) {
      id
      no
      date
      dueDate

          id
          name
          type
          phoneNumber

}
